line_en_US: Well, that was… surprisingly easy. Woah. What are these things?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: It looks like there are machines inside. Wait… Are they… alive?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I feel like there’s something… different about this one, and it looks like the one next to it is empty too. I wonder if I can open it…
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Is this how it goes? Maybe like… this?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Oh, it worked! Hey, there! I’m Iris! Do you know who you are?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I… I am Surface Reconnaissance Unit 02. You may call me SRU-2 for short.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Nice to meet you, SR… That’s kind of a mouthful. If you don’t mind, I’ll just call you, umm, S… R… U… Esaru… Seru… Seru!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Very well.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Can you walk, Seru?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I believe so.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Great, then let’s go!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: What is our destination?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Hmm. I think I’ve done enough exploring for today, so we should probably start making our way out of this place.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: It’s a little creepy in here to be honest, and, well, I’m kind of lost myself, so I’ll leave the navigating to you! You must know your way around, right?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Actually, my memories of this facility are… scattered. It seems deeply familiar, yet so distant. I will do my best.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Don’t worry, I’m sure your memory will come back soon! You seem like a nice person, so I’ll trust you to figure it out!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Hey, Seru, what are all these doors for?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: They are… I apologize. I cannot recall their purpose.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: It’s okay! Just take it one step at a time. I think these doors are like homes, so the people in there must be your friends and neighbors.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I knocked on a couple of them but yours was the only one I could get open, so, you’re a great discovery!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I can’t wait to show you off to everyone else once we get to the surface! Not many people in the village still believe that the old civilization ever existed, but you’re living proof that it did!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: The surface? A village? The…old civilization? I do not understand.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Oh, boy. I think you might have been out for quite a while. I think it would help to just see things for yourself, but maybe we can find some clues on our way out of here to help you piece things together.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Understood.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: What is this place? It looks so… abandoned.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: This appears to be some sort of locomotive transportation hangar. It seems we will need to board that tram if we want to leave.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Uh, what are those things?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: They must be security droids tasked with protecting this location.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Security breach detected. Targets include entity of unknown origin and possible renegade surface reconnaissance unit.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Decryonization of Unit-02 has not been authorized.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Uh-oh. It sounds like they didn’t want me to wake you up… or be here in the first place.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Breach confirmed. Initiate attack protocol.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Okay, I think they’re mad! Be careful!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Engaging enemy hostiles.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Nice job, Seru! That was incredible!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: It appears my combat programming is still intact.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: I’ll say! You’ve got some real skills with that blade!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Hey, so this thing… You called it a tram, right? How does it work?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: It exerts Geo energy to propel itself along a track. There should be a control mechanism nearby we can use to activate it.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Ah! I found it! Ready to go?
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: Indeed.
line_test: This is an example of translated text.

line_en_US: This is a bit slower than I expected, but it’s still amazing!
line_test: This is an example of translated text.
line_desc: Triggered 5 seconds after tram starts moving

line_en_US: That is… true. Hmm...
